title: HAP 83 - Songs of the People - Paul Robeson and the Negro Spiritual
itunes:title: HAP 83 - Songs of the People - Paul Robeson and the Negro Spiritual
description: The career of the multi-talented activist and performer Paul Robeson, and the place of the Negro spiritual in the Harlem Renaissance.
